profile.heading: Profile
profile.content: I can describe myself as a creative frontend developer with a healthy dose of humor and empathy. Driven by self-study and passionate about developing interactive websites.

projects.heading: Projects
projects.content: These are a number of projects that I have worked on with great pleasure. They range from HTML5, CSS3, Javascript, React and Vue.js to Salesforce.com projects.
